name: EverStopped
description:
In a dystopian future the United States of America is still engaged in a cold war against the Soviet bloc since the end of the Second World War. The conflict has been going on for almost a century and the two blocs are preparing to confront each other.

EverStopped puts you in the shoes of a soldier training to become an ELITE soldier. Dodge obstacles, shoot targets, protect yourself from danger, and perhaps you'll rest.
